name: marguerite
content:

a tall plant that grows in grass, with flowers that have white petals and a yellow centre: In the meadows the marguerites were in full bloom. The hayfields gave off a warm smell of marguerites and clover as the scythes cut through the grass. Synonym
ox-eye daisy
a garden plant with open flowers that have white or coloured petals and a yellow centre: Perennials which should be divided each season include the yellow marguerite. We grew marguerites, daisies, pansies, and wallflowers.
